thread.title: Strictly Come Dancing's Anton Du Beke announces birth of baby twins
thread.title_full: Strictly Come Dancing's Anton Du Beke announces birth of baby twins

author: Fiona Simpson
title: Strictly Come Dancing's Anton Du Beke announces birth of baby twins
text:
Strictly Come Dancing star Anton Du Beke has announced the birth of his baby twins. 
He took to Instagram to share the special news on Thursday, posting a picture of two tiny pairs of ribboned booties with his signature stage top hat and cane. 
He added the caption: "Oh my! The little dancing feet have arrived. Mum and twins are perfect and dad is ridiculously excited!" 
The new arrivals are his first children with partner Hannah Summers. A post shared by Anton Du Beke (@mrantondubeke) on Mar 30, 2017 at 11:18am PDT 
In the picture, one of the pairs of miniature shoes is topped with a blue bow and the other is topped with a pink one, following the dancer's previous comments that the couple were expecting a boy and a girl. 
Speaking to TV's Lorraine Kelly in January, the 50-year-old joked that he planned to name the children Antoine and Antoinette. 
But as the ITV presenter laughed at the idea, the dancer said: "That's not the reaction I get from Hannah, I get a stony silence." Read more 
When Kelly then presented him with two glittering bibs - again in blue and pink - as early gifts, he added: "You can never have enough sparkle in your life, early enough ... I hope my children are camp."
